incidentally she totally is. So um but
what Gotman found what Gotman and his

important predictors for whether or not
a couple were going to get divorced was
how positive or negative each partner
was being um in the conversation. Now,
couples that were very low risk scored a

scale than negative, whereas uh bad
relationships um by which I mean
probably going to get divorced, uh they
found themselves getting into a spiral
of negativity. Now, just by using these
very simple ideas, Gotman and his group
uh were able to predict whether a given

90% accuracy. But it wasn't until he
